landingTitle: Build your galactic empire. Trade. Raid.
landingDescription: Starplan is a real-time browser multiplayer game (MMO) where players build their own galactic empires.

features.title: Your resources. Your empire.
features.description: You decide how to invest your resources to expand your galactic empire.

features.title: Text-Based Gameplay.
features.description: Starplan can be accessed anywhere with an internet connection on all devices.

features.title: Modern and smooth User Experience.
